adjective.description: Relating to or denoting the process by which different kinds of living organisms are believed to have developed from earlier forms.
examples: chance enters into the evolutionary process in the form of naturally occurring random mutations

adjective.description: Relating to the gradual development of something.
examples: updating technology is an evolutionary process

adjective.description: Relating to a pattern of movements or maneuvers.
examples: he was in command of the evolutionary squadron
